examples.korean: He reacted violently only under provocation. 발음듣기 그는 도발을 당할 경우에만 폭력적인 반응을 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He reacted violently only under provocation. 발음

examples.korean: So far the police have refused to respond to their provocations. 발음듣기 지금까지 경찰은 그들의 도발에 반응을 보이지 않아 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: So far the police have refused to respond to their provocations. 발음

examples.korean: The lawyer claimed his client was provoked into acts of violence by the defendant. 발음듣기 그 변호사는 피고가 도발을 해서 자기 의뢰인이 폭력적인 행동을 하게 되었다고 주장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The lawyer claimed his client was provoked into acts of violence by the defendant. 발음

examples.korean: The prime minister has made some provocative speeches recently. 발음듣기 최근 수상은 약간 도발적인 연설을 했다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The prime minister has made some provocative speeches recently. 발음

examples.korean: The artist expressed his provocativity in his works. 발음듣기 그 예술가는 자신의 도발적인 기질을 작품으로 표현했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The artist expressed his provocativity in his works. 발음
